## Details

- Date: 29-30 January 2026
- Location: University of Zurich Main Building (KOL), Zurich, Switzerland
- Registration: ~~`https://forms.office.com/e/kRp1pxgrX6`~~

## About

The Research on Research Event 2026 brings together the Swiss Research on Research community for two days of talks, discussion, and collaborative work.
